text:
Click to save the data parmameter into a new file, update the
    geometry file to point to the new file, and clear the data
    parameter.   This will externalize the geometry and reduce the
    size of the .hip file at the cost of having to manage an external
    file.

The default name and path are controlled by the HOUDINI_STASH_DIR
    and HOUDINI_STASH_FILENAME environment variables.

Explicitly loads the specified geometry file and stores it in the
    data parameter.  This internalizes the stash file - the external
    file could be deleted after this as the authorative copy is now in
    the data parameter.
